product.name: Stir-fried beef with cove beans and noodles
product.Description: this is about the beef were stir fried with cove beans at 90 temperature and was eaten with noodles

product.name: Saldad
product.Description: a cold dish of various mixtures of raw or cooked vegetables, usually seasoned with oil, vinegar, or other dressing and sometimes accompanied by meat, fish, or other ingredients.

product.name: Chicken fried
product.Description: also known as Southern fried chicken, is a dish consisting of chicken pieces that have been coated with seasoned flour or batter and pan-fried, deep fried, pressure fried, or air fried. The breading adds a crisp coating or crust to the exterior of the chicken while retaining juices in the meat. Broiler chickens are most commonly used.
